May 02, 2006, at 11:47 PM by 85.105.103.84
Added lines 1-62:

Depo oluşturulması:

  1. cvs -d /var/lib/cvsd/cvsroot init
  2. vim /etc/cvsd/cvsd.conf 
	Repos /cvsroot
  1. cd /var/lib/cvsd
  2. chown -R cvsd:cvsd cvsroot/

Kullanıcı Eklenmesi:

  1. cvsd-passwd /var/lib/cvsd/cvsroot ozgun

Depo'ya login olunması:

cvs -d :pserver:ozgun@localhost:/cvsroot login

CVSROOT,CVSEDITOR

  1. vim ~/.bashrc 
	export CVSROOT=:pserver:ozgun@hal:/cvsroot
	export CVSEDITOR=gvim

Anonymous kullanıcıların eklenmesi:

  1. touch /var/lib/cvsd/cvsroot/CVSROOT/readers
  2. chown cvsd:cvsd /var/lib/cvsd/cvsroot/CVSROOT/readers
  3. vim /var/lib/cvsd/cvsroot/CVSROOT/readers 
	guest
	anonymous
	misafir

Depo'ya proje eklenmesi:(start)

  1. mkdir -p $HOME/Projects/prj1
  2. touch file2 file2 file3
  3. cd $HOME/Projects/prj1
  4. cvs import -m "Prj1 Project" prj1 ozgun start

Depo'dan proje alınması:(check out)

  1. cd $HOME/Temp
  2. cvs checkout prj1

???Klasör izinleri ve sahiplikleri:????

  1. cd /var/lib
  2. chown -R cvsd:cvsd cvsd
  3. chmod -R 775 /var/lib/cvsd/var
Restore
